newsitem.title: USA: NSC Corp names Barnhart as acting CEO.
newsitem.headline: NSC Corp names Barnhart as acting CEO.

text.p: NSC Corp said Tuesday its board had named Victor Barnhart as acting president and CEO following the resignation of Frank Fradella.
NSC said Fradella left the company to take a position with a construction firm in Houston, Texas.
It said the board appointed Barnhart for 90 days, during which he will help it look both within and without the company for a permanent replacement.
NSC said Barnhart will also head WMX Technologies' Integrated Environmental Services business unit in the meantime.
Barnhart once served as president of The Brand Companies Inc, whose asbestos abatement division was bought by NSC in 1993, it said.
NSC Corporation specializes in the contracting industry and supplies asbestos abatement services to industrial, commercial, governmental and institutional clients across the country.
